alert.note: Alert for Noatak Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 22 at 3:49PM AKDT until October 24 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and periods of blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Noatak Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow, strongest winds and lowest visibility above 1000 ft. Snow may mix with to rain Monday and Monday night at low elevations.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
